location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Ext 1948/43 Iraqi dinar notes repatriated from Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: The fileâ€™s contents are arranged in approximate chronological order, comprising one letter.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Letter form Sir Kinahan Cornwallis, HR Ambassador from Iran to the Foreign Office, relating the cost in dinar notes of some parcels that were despatched by air but lost off the coast of Spain.
